com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKMapSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKMapSettings

  • public final class SKMapSettings
extends java.util.Observable
    Defines settings for the map view.
    Version:
    2.4

      • isShowBicycleLanes

        public boolean isShowBicycleLanes()
        Indicates if bicycle lanes should be shown.
        Returns:
        true if the bicycle lanes need to be shown at map initialization. Default values is false.

      • setShowBicycleLanes

        public void setShowBicycleLanes(boolean showBicycleLanes)
        Sets whether bicycle lanes should be shown or not
        Parameters:
        showBicycleLanes - if true bicycle lanes will be shown on map.Default value is false.

      • isOneWayArrows

        public boolean isOneWayArrows()
        Indicates if one way arrows on the map.
        Returns:
        true if one way arrows need to be shown on the map. Default value is true.

      • setOneWayArrows

        public void setOneWayArrows(boolean oneWayArrows)
        Set whether one way arrows should be shown on the map.
        Parameters:
        oneWayArrows - if true one way arrows will be shown on the map. Default value is true.

      • isCityPoisShown

        public boolean isCityPoisShown()
        Return if city pois should be shown on the map.
        Returns:
        a boolean that tells if city pois should be shown on the map .Refers to : country, state, city, town, village, suburb, hamlet, ocean, sea

      • setCityPoisShown

        public void setCityPoisShown(boolean cityPoisShown)
        Set if city pois should be shownon the map.
        Parameters:
        cityPoisShown - parameter that tells if city pois should be shown on the map.Refers to : country, state, city, town, village, suburb, hamlet, ocean, sea

      • isGeneratedPoisShown

        public boolean isGeneratedPoisShown()
        Return if generated pois should be shown on the map.
        Returns:
        a boolean that tells if generated pois should be shown on the map. Refers to generated pois except the one mentioned in city pois.

      • setGeneratedPoisShown

        public void setGeneratedPoisShown(boolean generatedPoisShown)
        Set if generated pois should be shown on the map.
        Parameters:
        generatedPoisShown - parameter that tells if generated pois should be shown on the map. Refers to generated pois except the one mentioned in city pois.

      • isImportantPoisShown

        public boolean isImportantPoisShown()
        Return if important pois should be shown on the map.
        Returns:
        a boolean that tells if important pois should be shown on the map. Refers to unique POIs explicitly specified in the style JSON files

      • setImportantPoisShown

        public void setImportantPoisShown(boolean importantPoisShown)
        Set if important pois should be shown on the map.
        Parameters:
        importantPoisShown - parameter that tells if important pois should be shown on the map.Refers to unique POIs explicitly specified in the style JSON files.

      • isHouseNumbersShown

        public boolean isHouseNumbersShown()
        Return if house numbers are shown on the map.
        Returns:
        true if house numbers are shown on the map , false otherwise.

      • setHouseNumbersShown

        public void setHouseNumbersShown(boolean houseNumbersShown)
        Enable / disable house numbers on the map.
        Parameters:
        houseNumbersShown - will be true if house numbers have to be shown on the map , false otherwise. Default value is true.

      • isCompassShown

        public boolean isCompassShown()
        Return is the compass is shown on the map.
        Returns:
        true if the compass is shown on the map, false otherwise. Default value is false.

      • setCompassShown

        public void setCompassShown(boolean compassShown)
        Enable / disable compass on the map.
        Parameters:
        compassShown - if true the compass will be shown on the map.

      • isZoomWithAnchorEnabled

        public boolean isZoomWithAnchorEnabled()
        Return if map is set to zomm using anchor. Map will always zoom to the center point of the map instead of the pinched points if this returns true.
        Returns:
        true if map zoom with anchor is enabled , false otherwise.Default value is false.

      • setZoomWithAnchorEnabled

        public void setZoomWithAnchorEnabled(boolean zoomWithAnchorEnabled)
        Enable / disable zoom with anchor. Map will always zoom to the center point of the map instead of the pinched points if this is set to true. Default is false
        Parameters:
        zoomWithAnchorEnabled -

      • setZoomLimits

        public void setZoomLimits(float minZoom,
                 float maxZoom)
        Sets the map zoom limits.
        Parameters:
        minZoom - value between 1 and 19
        maxZoom - value between 1 and 19

      • getZoomLimits

        public float[] getZoomLimits()
        Returns the map zoom limits in the following format {minZoom, maxZoom}.

      • getMapDisplayMode

        public SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode getMapDisplayMode()
        Return map display mode. Possible values are SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode.MODE_2D and SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode.MODE_3D.
        Returns:
        map display mode.

      • setMapDisplayMode

        public void setMapDisplayMode(SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode mapDisplayMode)
        Set map display mode.Possible values are SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode.MODE_2D and SKMapSettings.SKMapDisplayMode.MODE_3D.
        Parameters:
        mapDisplayMode - new map display mode

      • isCurrentPositionShown

        public boolean isCurrentPositionShown()

        Parameters:
        streetNamePopupsShown - true if street names should be shown in 3D as popups, false otherwise.

      • getFollowerMode

        public SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode getFollowerMode()
        Return the map follower mode. Possible values are SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.NONE, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.POSITION, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.POSITION_PLUS_HEADING, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.NAVIGATION
        Returns:
        follower mode

      • setFollowerMode

        public void setFollowerMode(SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode followerMode)
        Set the follower mode for the map. Possible values are SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.NONE, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.POSITION, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.POSITION_PLUS_HEADING, SKMapSettings.SKMapFollowerMode.NAVIGATION
        Parameters:
        followerMode - new follower mode

        Sets the current map view style.
        Parameters:
        mapStyle - new map view style.

      • getOrientationIndicatorType

        public SKMapSurfaceView.SKOrientationIndicatorType getOrientationIndicatorType()
        Sets the orientation indicator type, used when POSITION_PLUS_TRIANGLE follower is active. If SKOrientationIndicatorCustomImage is set, the "heading.png" image file from the style's resources will be used.
        Returns:

      • setOrientationIndicatorType

        public void setOrientationIndicatorType(SKMapSurfaceView.SKOrientationIndicatorType orientationIndicatorType)
